item.title: Hello! 👋🏽
item.description: Thanks for stopping by my humble abode on the internet. I am Akhil Panchal. Software Engineer by profession. I aspire to write clean and minimalist code that humans can read and maintain. I decided to create algorythm.dev to document my journey of being a professional Software Engineer, as well as other interests that I explore.
